member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the serializer should use the static open method or the constructor on deserializing the FeatureSet.

member.summary: This static method is only meant to be used by the deserializer.

Name of the layer that should be loaded.

member.summary: Gets the feature at the given index.
member.param: Index of the feature that should be returned.
member.returns: The feature belonging to the given index.

member.name: T:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SpatiaLiteHelper
member.summary: Helper class with SpatiaLite specific operations.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SpatiaLiteHelper.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. This is used to hide the default constructor because Open should be used so validation checks can be run before creating a SpatiaLiteHelper.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SpatiaLiteHelper.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Connectionstring used to work with the database.
Indicates that the this is a spatialite database of version 4 or higher.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SpatiaLiteHelper.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets the connection string of the connected database.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SpatiaLiteHelper.Open(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Trys to open the database of the given connection string. This fails if either the spatialite version or the geometry_columns table can't be found.
member.param: Connectionstring used to work with the database.
The variable that is used to return the error message. This is empty if there was no error.
member.returns: Null on error otherwise the SpatiaLiteHelper connected to the database.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SpatiaLiteHelper.SetEnvironmentVars
member.summary: Sets the environment variables so that SpatiaLite can find the dll's.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SpatiaLiteHelper.GetColumnNames(System.String)
member.summary: Finds all column names in the database table.
member.param: table name

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SpatiaLiteHelper.GetGeometryColumns
member.summary: Finds a list of all valid geometry columns in the database.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SpatiaLiteHelper.GetTableNames
member.summary: Finds all table names in the SpatiaLite database.
member.returns: a list of all table names

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SpatiaLiteHelper.ReadFeatureSet(DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.GeometryColumnInfo)
member.summary: Reads the complete feature set from the database
member.param: information about the table

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SpatiaLiteHelper.ReadFeatureSet(DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.GeometryColumnInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Reads the complete feature set from the database
member.param: information about the table
the sql query

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SpatiaLiteHelper.ReadFeatureSet(System.String)
member.summary: Reads the feature set with the given name from the database.
member.param: Name of the table whose content should be loaded.
member.returns: Null if the table wasn't found otherwise the tables content.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SpatiaLiteHelper.AssignGeometryTypeStringAndCoordDimension(System.Int32,DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.GeometryColumnInfo)
member.summary: Gets the GeometryType string and the CoordDimension from the given geometryTypeInt and assigns them to the given GeometryColumnInfo.
member.param: geometryTypeInt that indicates the GeometryType and CoordDimension that was used.
The GeometryColumnInfo the values get assigned to.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SpatiaLiteHelper.CheckSpatiaLiteSchema(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the schema is a valid schema (has a geometry_columns table)
member.param: The connectionstring for the database.
member.returns: True, if the schema has a geometry_columns table.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SpatiaLiteHelper.CreateCommand(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a SQLite command
member.param: connection string
command text

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SpatiaLiteHelper.GetSpatialVersion(System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Gets the spatialite version.
member.param: The ConnectionString used to connect to the database.
Indicates whether this database has a structur belonging to version 4.0+.
member.returns: True, if a version indicator could be found.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SpatiaLiteWkbReader.Read(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Reads SpatiaLite data from the given stream. This is also called by Read(byte[] data).
member.param: Stream that should be used to read the data.
member.returns: IGeometry that is contained in the given stream.

member.summary: The type of SQLite database (data repositor or metadata cache)

member.summary: Data repository sqlite database

member.name: F:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.DatabaseType.MetadataCacheDatabase

member.name: T:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SqLiteHelper
member.summary: This class contains methods for working with the SQLite database.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SqLiteHelper.DatabaseExists(System.String)
member.summary: Check if the path is a valid SQLite database. This function returns false, if the SQLite db file doesn't exist or if the file size is 0 Bytes.
member.param: Path of the SQLite db.
member.returns: False if the SQLite db file doesn't exist or it's size is 0 bytes.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SqLiteHelper.GetSqLiteConnectionString(System.String)
member.summary: To get the full SQLite connection string given the SQLite database path.
member.param: Name of the SQLite db file.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.SpatiaLite.SqLiteHelper.GetSqLiteFileName(System.String)
member.summary: To get the SQLite database path given the SQLite connection string.
member.param: The connection string.
